phrases: If you are not paying attention, be prepared for a poking attack from my fingers
I am little, but I will squish you; you are as tiny as a flea to me
What I want is a plastic heart (plus, plus, but it is a minus)
But that is boring; when I would notice it, I would have won against you
Love is something that is bittersweet
Simple and clear yet complex and strange stuff
I am only worrying about things that do not matter
You are gentle and sincere yet eccentric
I pretend to be strong all over and compete against you
Just by being honest, it is so stimulating and I feel dizzy
I get hurt, I hurt you, in a preparation of pure feelings
In my head, there is always a pre-parade of pure feelings all by myself
Then let us put salt on
Because I want you to know more about me
More than anyone else, I want to bare my self
But I cannot do it, I have got nothing for experience
But a love that is just sweet
Is slightly different from what I am seeking
If I am told it is white
I would say it is black
I say one thing but do another
If I am told, I love you
I would say, I hate you
I am happy, but what am I saying?
Fluffy bangs give a gentle expression
There is something in this world that nobody has seen yet.
I only just cleaned it off, too.
It is something gentle and very sweet...
Where did I put that rag?
That is why the world has hidden it.
To make sure that not just anyone can get their hands on it.
Shit, it is not coming off!
But it is nothing a Takasu cannot handle...
But at some point, someone will find it.
The one who is destined to do so will be able to find it.
That is just how it works.
I told you last night that I have school as of today, right?
Should you really be sarcastic about the fact that your son's moving on to a new school year?
That is a huge apartment building.
I wonder what kind of people live there.
After it was built, the sun stopped shining here, and our laundry does not dry well.
Every morning there is mould, mould, and more mould -
You are looking more and more like your dad!
Do not compare me to tha -
It is where it always is.
That was the one thing I did not want to hear.
It is because of this look in my eyes, which you always praise, that I...
What the hell are you doing?!
Please accept this and spare us!
We are not annoying you, right?!
You sure pick up a lot of wallets.
I hope we end up in the same class again!
We are in the same class again!
We are in the same class again, right Takasu?
And now this year's opening ceremony has ended.
Everyone, please head towards your individual classrooms and prepare for homeroom.
It seems that I have to start off by clearing up all the misunderstandings again.
I already know, so it will not be necessary for everyone.
There are people like him who understand.
We are in the same class this year too!
You are in class C too, Kushieda?
I appear around Kitamura-kun from time to time.
Oh, you remembered my full name!
And with that, let us enjoy youth with high spirits and great passion!
I-I just need to go the bathroom.
Okay, I will go on ahead.
He is already heading into a decisive battle!
The two bad asses are already clashing!
Whoa, she is so small... just like a doll, but somehow...
As if you would get eaten if you missed one step...
The delinquent Takasu-kun and the Palmtop Tiger are -
Okay, that is it for today.
Those who have not turned in the new questionnaire,
please come to the faculty office later, okay?
I went to the doctor, and he said that it is caused by house dust.
A modern-day illness, must be tough.
So the Palmtop Tiger is friends with Kushieda Minori.
The one with problems here is me.
They were amazing, Aisaka-san and Takasu-kun!
The Palmtop Tiger sure is strong.
He is not actually a delinquent.
Seems it will be easier to clear up the misunderstandings.
T-Takasu-kun, you are not lost about where to go with your life, are you?
B-But I really need you to turn in your questionnaire.
All of the other students have submitted theirs already.
You do not want some stranger coming in and telling you what to do...
I will just leave her be.
I just came here to get my -
Is not your seat the ne -
Do not tell me I got the seats m-mixed -
Why does she want my bag?
He would hide weekly magazines behind his shirt in case he got stabbed.
I am going numb just from the thought!
Just because I look like you...
I am having mountains of trouble you know!
If I did not have this face, no one would be afraid of me,
and I would not end up getting involved with the Palmtop Tiger.
I would have more faith in myself.
You put this in my bag by a mistake, right?
I cannot imagine what is inside since I did not peek!
So I will just return it to you, then!
Shit, I have got to reseal it!
She is one hell of a klutz, is not she?
Yasuko is not supposed to be home yet, right?
I cannot live any longer now that you have found out about that.
Then, do not try to kill me!
I do not want to die, so I have got to kill you!
Or you could forget all about it!
It will be okay, I will just hit you on the head with this.
Even if I cannot kill you, I can send your memories flying away.
I am trying to tell you, I did not -
So you have to forget all about that l-love love letter!
You are lucky you did not give it to Kitamura.
So let us just leave this failure be and -
I got tired of the convenience store.
What, do not your parents fe -
Everyone has their own family issues, I guess.
If you had just quietly handed over the bag earlier, things would not have ended up like this.
How do you intend to make up for it?!
It is still stuck to your face.
Hearing that from a guy who was born simply for the task of adding the scent of garlic to the oil used in this fried rice...
How is a love letter embarrassing?
Listen, that is not even close to being embarrassing.
Do you know what that is?
That is a list of songs I would use if I were to put on a concert for the girl I like.
That is a poem I wrote for her without realising it.
Minidiscs to play while I am on a car trip with her.
I do not have a license, of course.
I have plans laid out for all seasons of the year.
Since I do not have the guts to confess to her, I can only imagine like this.
It is horribly miserable, but I do not think it is embarrassing!
You have got to have faith in yourself!
You went beyond imagining and took action!
You have got to think about the future with high spirits and great passion!
I present to this to thee, Kushieda Minori.
You are not one to talk!
What are you saying about my precious family?!
Are you going to present yourself to the visitor, Inko-chan?
Go ahead and say your name!
No, you see, Inko-chan is not feeling well today...
Whoa, it is already this late!
E-Either way, we are birds of the same feather!
I will not tell anyone about the letter!
Cannot you be satisfied with that?
No wait, you have already had a meal, so just leave!
My wacky mum is about to come home!
What do you think of love letters?
They are not fashionable any more, are they?
I will give you advice on romantic relationships any time,
but it is already late, so how about tomorrow?
You will obey me like a dog?
You will do anything to the extreme?
So, let us just end it at that, okay?
How did she get in through the window?
It is close, and I have got this wooden sword.
I can just cover it up with some paper.
If it ends up costing money, I will pay you later.
Wait, did she just call me by my first name?
Yes, this is the Takasu residenc -
You hung up, did not you?
You said you would do anything, just like a dog, right?
Wait, that was the thing yesterday about Kitamura -
If you do not come, you know what will happen, do not you?
I can show you what will happen if you want me to...
The seasoned rice will be done in ten more minutes!
What the hell is this smell?
Please, allow me to clean your kitchen!
She looks like she was hand crafted...
The sleeping Aisaka really looked like a doll.
The house had no trace of anyone really living there.
It looked like it was part of someone is doll house.
But it was too large to be someone is doll house.
It will take fifteen minutes, I guess.
I am still at it, but it is a lot cleaner now is not it?
The water clogged up in the sink was rotten.
The drainage was awfully mouldy and all the waste was like hell spawn.
And the room was full of dust -
You did not go around marking the place, did you, dog?!
I will have to apologise to the other dogs.
You are a mongrel of a dog.
What an ungrateful bitch, when other people have -
Hey, where is your table prayer?
Dear god of rice and producers of this product, I thank you for this meal!
Yeah, since the room's all clean...
You are one hell of a klutz.
